articles.description: A committed semi-final performance of backbone, heart and brain points the way to a brighter future for England.
articles.title: England lose a match, but find a spark to give hope for future

articles.description: Follow live text, in-play video clips and radio commentary as India play New Zealand in the Men's Cricket World Cup 2023.
articles.title: World Cup: India look for early wickets against New Zealand

articles.description: Supporters leave flowers and scarves at Old Trafford, where they can also sign a book of condolence.
articles.title: Sir Bobby Charlton: Fans gather to remember Man Utd legend

articles.description: England flanker Tom Curry reported that South Africa hooker Bongi Mbonambi used a racial slur towards him during the Springboks' Rugby World Cup semi-final win.
articles.title: South Africa's Mbonambi accused of racial slur in win

articles.description: Rory McIlroy tells BBC Sport why he is investing in F1 - and why he didn't invest in Leeds United.
articles.title: As a Man Utd fan I can't invest in Leeds - McIlroy

articles.description: Follow updates from Sunday's three SWPL matches, including Celtic v Rangers, and watch Hearts host Motherwell.
articles.title: SWPL: Celtic v Rangers kicks off three games

articles.description: India's Mohammed Shami removes New Zealand opener Will Young with his first ball of this World Cup as the only two unbeaten teams meet in Dharamsala.
articles.title: Shami strikes with his first ball of the World Cup

articles.description: Hope is not totally lost but thrashing by South Africa felt like the day England's golden era in 50-over cricket came to an end.
articles.title: 'England crumble as a golden era threatens to fall apart'

articles.description: Lewis Hamilton says the leading cars will "have a job on their hands" to prevent Max Verstappen winning Sunday's United States Grand Prix.
articles.title: Verstappen rivals have job on their hands - Hamilton

articles.description: Brisbane Heat's Grace Harris sets new records in the Women's Big Bash League - including one six with a broken bat.
articles.title: Harris hits six with broken bat in record WBBL score
